short_term_goals: Refine technology using Google's AI expertise.
Establish foundation for fast and secure licensing.
growth_strategy.long_term_vision: To unlock fast and secure licensing and revenue opportunities for millions of IP and digital assets worldwide, becoming the leading platform for AI-driven data licensing.
expansion_plans: Expand market reach beyond initial target audience (brands and AI teams).
Explore partnerships with major AI platforms and data providers.
Develop new features and functionalities to address evolving market needs.
Potentially expand geographically, although no specific location is publicly available at this time.
growth_strategy.scaling_approach: V-Art's scaling approach appears to rely on a combination of technology development, strategic partnerships, and targeted marketing. The focus on AI-driven solutions and blockchain technology suggests a commitment to automation and efficiency. The Google Accelerator program is likely crucial for refining the technology and optimizing scalability. They will need to focus on acquiring users (both licensors and licensees) and ensuring the platform's ability to handle a growing volume of transactions and data.
